Alert Name: bush
Lockheed employs D.C.'s last honest man
The defense contractor's general counsel once tried to stop some of the Justice Department's most questionable actions. What does that say about the company? Fortune's Jon Birger explains.
05/17/07 11:53 AM, EDT
Lockheed Martin wasn't my favorite defense stock the last time I wrote about the sector back in January. But based on the recent news reports out of Washington, I've got a sudden spot for the company - one unrelated to Lockheed's business or its earnings prospects.
FULL STORY
